mods.abstract: First recording contains excerpts from an Opry Star Spotlight radio program featuring interviews with Tex Ritter on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.) Interviews conducted by Ralph Emery. Second recording is KVOO (Tulsa, Okla.) radio program of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band. Originally broadcast 1948. Sponsored by Gates tires, with announcer Johnny Ryan. Third recording is KVOO (Tulsa, Okla.) radio program of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band. Originally broadcast 1952.
